verses.roman:
śata-haste karena yena kṣālana-mārjana
pratijana-pāśe yāi' karāna śikṣana

synonyms: śata-haste—with one hundred hands; karena—He does; yena—as if; kṣālana-mārjana—rinsing and washing; pratijana-pāśe yāi'-going to the side of everyone; karāna śikṣaṇa—He was teaching them.
translation: It appeared as though Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu were cleansing and washing with a hundred hands. He approached every devotee just to teach him how to work.
